article.description: C.J. McCollum scored 29 points and had 14 rebounds, and Lehigh defeated Holy Cross 79-75 in overtime Saturday.
article.headline: C.J. McCollum, Lehigh edge Holy Cross in OT
article.linkText: Brown's 27 not enough as Holy Cross falls in OT
article.story: BETHLEHEM, Pa. -- C.J. McCollum scored 29 points and had 14 rebounds, and Lehigh defeated Holy Cross 79-75 in overtime Saturday. Lehigh started the overtime period with a 7-0 run and never trailed. Holy Cross cut the lead to 77-75 with 49 seconds remaining on a 3-pointer by Devin Brown, but a basket by Jordan Hamilton with 23 seconds left sealed it for Lehigh. Hamilton hit two free throws with 46 seconds to go in regulation to force overtime. McCollum has scored at least 23 points in seven straight games. Gabe Knutson added 22 points for Lehigh (12-10, 3-4 Patriot League), which has won three in a row in the series. Lehigh scored 22 points off 18 Holy Cross turnovers and outrebounded the Crusaders 42-34. Brown led Holy Cross (4-17, 3-4) with 27 points on 10-of-15 shooting from the field. Mike Cavataio added 13 points for the Crusaders, who have lost three consecutive games.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
